submitMessage: The information contained in this form will be made available on-line to the SRSS. Any applications received directly from Member State administrations will be forwarded to SRSS for evaluation. This application form has a validity period of two years from the date that it was submitted; TAIEX reserves the right to cancel any event that has not been implemented within the two year period.

questionList.label: Event type
questionList.hint: Please select one project type (workshop, expert mission or study visit) or in case of multiple events please select series of events

questionList.label: Objective of the request
questionList.hint: Please include a list of the workshops, expert missions and study visits that you would like to request within the above-mentioned project and the relevant Chapter/Sub-chapter of EU Legislation cited later. (Participant information will be required later in relation to study visits)

questionList.label: Why specifically is a study visit being requested instead of an expert mission or a workshop?
What policy area(s) - as specified in Article 5(2) of the SRSP Regulation - does the exchange concern?

list.name: Revenue Administration and Public Financial Management
Labour Market, Education, Health and Social Services
Financial Sector and Access to Finance

questionList.label: What specific objective(s) of Article 5(1) of the SRSP Regulation does the exchange concern?

list.name: The design phase of a reform
The development and implementation phase of a reform
The definition and implementation of processes and methodologies
Improving the effciency and effectiveness of public administration human resources management

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list briefly (a) the issues to be discussed with the expert(s) and (b) the expected outputs/deliverables of the exchange

questionList.label: Current situation/justification
questionList.hint: Please briefly describe the current situation related to the sector of assistance concerned and additional information that will contribute to the design and preparation of the event

questionList.label: Is there any planned or currently running project financed by EU funds and/or other international programmes dealing with the issues covered by the request? Has any such project been implemented in the last two years?
questionList.hint: If yes, please provide details thereof

questionList.label: Additional information
questionList.hint: Please provide the following information for each of the events in the series (max 5)

questionList.label: Proposed indicative date of the exchange/event
Main topics/content
questionList.hint: Please list briefly (a) the issues to be discussed with the expert(s) and (b) the expected outputs/deliverables of the exchange

questionList.label: Member State administration(s) from which the expertise is sought
questionList.hint: Preferred Member State (The choice cannot be always guaranteed), Optional

questionList.label: Do you know the Member State(s) expert(s) from whom expertise is sought (Optional)?
Beneficiary contact person for administrative questions and practical matters related to this event
Contact person for the evaluation of the impact of TAIEX - SRSP PEER 2 PEER assistance (after the exchange has taken place)
Add participants
questionList.hint: The data you provided will be used solely for the organisation of TAIEX - SRSP PEER 2 PEER events unless otherwise stated.
